Any idea what have I done wrong during the installation?

body:
@apaszke Even if I moved out of the root directory, I still got the error: 

> Traceback (most recent call last):
>   File "tensor_tutorial.py", line 24, in <module>
>     import torch
>   File "/Users/STW/Documents/Projects/pytorch/build/lib.macosx-10.12-x86_64-2.7/torch/__init__.py", line 48, in <module>
>     import torch._dl as _dl_flags
> ImportError: No module named _dl

Any idea what have I done wrong during the installation?
